title: What can I do with a minor in criminal justice? - Quora

response.answer_text: Are you trying to defend him or hurt him? You did not say. You can testify in his favor or you can complain about him or her. You can get the minor in trouble and get him to hate you, and get the parents to sue you in federal court. Lawyers usually want a twenty thousand dollars as a deposit for taking on a federal court.

response.answer_text: Since I was a2a, the minor is neither necessarily positive nor negative, the outcome depends on their major, their GPA, the quality of their character, and their overall competence. It would not be an impediment for any employment, and even policing doe not require CJ studies to qualify.
